title: Expert Course on Designing and Evaluating eLearning Programs for Tourism Destinations

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental tourism industry knowledge and digital marketing experience
context.additional_context: Most learners are regional tourism institution managers/leaders who need to strengthen e-learning content production and evaluation capabilities in digital transformation settings

learning_goals: Learners can develop a learning interface by applying user experience (UX) design principles for tourism e-learning courses.
Through project-based assessment, learners can complete one e-learning module for promoting a tourism destination.
By analyzing learning data, learners can diagnose usability issues in e-learning content and suggest improvements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
